item.title: Read Google F1
item.description: Abstract a protocol for schema evolution in a globally distributed database management system with shared data, stateless servers, and no global membership. asynchronous all servers can access and update all data during a schema change INTRODUCTION Schema evolution: the ability to change a databaseâ€™s definition without the loss of data F1 is built on top of Spanner, a globally distributed KV data store Main feature The main features of F1 that impact schema changes are:
